author: Peter Dorelli
description: A lightly creamy, after dinner drink.
name: Golden Reign
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
